name: Solar System (itch) (DonielDoom)
description:
A small solar system with Mercury, Venus, Earth, Moon, Mars, Jupiter, Saturn, Uranus, Neptune, and Comet game objects. 

Notes:

  • Each object has a unique texture and sound
  • Each planet emits sound in 3D to fade in and out, relative to the distance to the camera
  • Each object has 1-2 rotation scripts to rotate around itself and/or the sun
  • Comet settings have been adjusted for camera perspective and personal preference/aesthetics
  • Ability to click on objects to snap camera (right click resets to the sun)
  • Minimap is janky due to scaling
  • Screenshot 1: Unity Hierarchy panel
  • Screenshot 2: Unity Project panel

Created by Danny Jumper
